article_title: Interfaith forum on erosion of religious freedom to be held in Orlando

article_metadata.fb_title: Interfaith forum to focus on religious freedom
article_metadata.author: Orlando Sentinel

og.description: Calling religious persecution a worldwide crisis, an interfaith group of leaders and scholars will come together Tuesday night in Orlando for a free public presentation on the subject.
og.title: Interfaith forum to focus on religious freedom

article_metadata.Description: Tuesday night's forum in Orlando on protecting religious freedom is likely to range from comparatively minor intrusions in this country to death and torture abroad. But some say even small erosions are unacceptable.
